description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              - Collect & analyze the need of all Depart. Managers
              
              - Writing & publishing different job vacancies and follow up on Job boards such as: Vietnamworks, LinkedIn…
              
              - Sourcing, hunting and developing a network of specialized candidates
              
              - Identification and qualification of potential candidates
              
              - Set up and administration of search agents
              
              - Pre- selection via phone calls and arrange interview schedule with managers.
              
              - Develop database of candidates to make sure all vacancy is ready to fulfill.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              - University graduate.
              
              - 1-2 year of working experience.
              
              - Ability to work under pressure
              
              - Good at English in communication
              
              - Hard working, flexible, go beyond call of duty to keep high satisfaction levels
              
              - Passionate and able to manage situations which are complicated and bring out solutions
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
             








                19 days full paid leave
               







                Bonus
               







                Yearly travel
